commentary: Great experience with Vue.js, strong understanding of the `script setup` syntax. Impressive portfolio with several well-documented projects.
Solid front-end skills and deep knowledge of Vue Router and Vuex. Demonstrated ability to work with Firebase and RESTful APIs.
Experience with Composition API is evident, but would love to see more contributions to open-source Vue libraries.
The resume highlights strong problem-solving skills and experience with modern build tools like Vite and Webpack.
Good mix of Vue.js and TypeScript. Would like to see more examples of testing using tools like Jest or Cypress.
